entry.title: Feed Moved to http://feeds.feedburner.com/jonnyzzz

link.title: Hints in Stack Traces on the JVM

content.p: Thank you for reading my blog!
I need to improve the way this RSS Feed is generated and delivered. Please switch to the following URL:
It is not possible to track RSS Feed activity from a static web-site easily, but I really like to know more about my readers.
I found the way to fix that. But, unfortunately, it requires to change the RSS Feed URL. Now I use Google feedburner to capture analytics.

entry.summary: Feed URL was changed to use FeedBurner
